segments.text: This kitchen drawing catches my eye with its details.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink holds a plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is overflowing profusely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours out, soaking the cabinet and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she keeps working.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the children to be up to mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool, reaching into the cookie jar high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool leans back dangerously, which shocks me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, and a plate too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches toward him, clearly in on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view outside is so unexpectedly peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who knew such chaos hid behind that normal facade?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame the whole sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how unaware the adult is.
segments.speaker: PAR
